alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Raft River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 8:34PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms with gusty winds in excess of 40 mph will impact portions of southeastern Oneida and southwestern Franklin Counties through 900 PM MDT... At 833 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Snowville to near Franklin. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Preston, Malad, Franklin, Pleasantview, Cherry Creek Rest Area, Holbrook Summit, Dayton, Weston, Clifton, Mapleton, Stone, Mink Creek, Samaria, Whitney, Riverdale and Holbrook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Raft River Region
